abstract: Avalanche strikes students skiing in French Alps, sweeping away 19 teenagers and three instructors and killing at least three people.

headline.print_headline: Europe; France: At Least 3 Die in Avalanche
headline.main: Avalanche in French Alps Leaves at Least 3 Dead

snippet: An avalanche at the Deux-Alpes ski resort swept away a group of 10 teenagers from Lyon and three supervisors, as well as a Ukrainian skier.
lead_paragraph: An avalanche at the Deux-Alpes ski resort swept away a group of 10 teenagers from Lyon and three supervisors, as well as a Ukrainian skier.
